spec_history.diff_summary: Initial feature generation from spec - comprehensive coverage of core infrastructure, PDK support (Nangate45/ASAP7/Sky130), ECO execution, safety model, Ray parallelism, auto-diagnosis, visualization (heatmaps/differentials/overlays), priors, checkpointing, and demo requirements

Major spec expansion: Added doom detection (early termination of hopeless cases), cross-project prior learning (prior repository with export/import), immutable design rules (protected macros/nets/cells), mandatory Ray Dashboard for demos, human approval gates, strict demo execution policy (NO mocking/placeholders), real ECO execution requirements (modified ODB propagation), extreme snapshot generation (WNS < -1500ps), real visualization (matplotlib PNGs), implementation roadmap, and critical implementation gaps documentation
